## Splatter publication {#splatter-publication}

```{r splatter-paper, results = "asis"}
name <- "Splatter"
pdf <- "figures/03-splatter-paper-cropped"
pages <- 1:15
link <- "https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13059-017-1305-0"

if (tex) {
    glue::glue("\\frame{\\includegraphics[page=<pages>, width=\\textwidth]{<pdf>}}\\clearpage",
               .open = "<", .close = ">")
} else {
    glue::glue("You can read the {name} paper [here]({link}).")
}
```
